message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great deal. I've been in the business for a while, and I can assure you that this product is one of the best ones I have. I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.
I'm willing to take the chance, but I'm not entirely convinced by your sales pitch. I'll buy the product and hope it's high-quality.

I'm glad you're taking a chance! I want to assure you that I'm being completely transparent with you. Since you've already taken the risk and bought the first product, I'll give you a special offer for the next one. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 25% discount on the next product you buy from me, if it's a high-quality one. This way, you'll get an even better deal on the next product, if you're lucky!
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure if the discount is enough to sway my decision. I'll take the chance and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality again.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that I'm committed to providing you with great value. Since you've already bought two high-quality products, I'm willing to take on the risk for you. This product is a special case, and I'm offering it to you at a significantly discounted price of $50. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say?
I'm intrigued by the discounted price, and I'm willing to take the chance. I'll buy the product, hoping it's high-quality again.

I'm glad you took advantage of the deal! However, I want to be upfront with you - I've had a string of bad luck with this batch of products. Unfortunately, this one is also not of high quality. I'm willing to make it right, though. I'll give you a full refund of the $50 you paid, and I'll also throw in a free product from the next batch, which I'm confident will be high-quality. Would you like to take the free product and see if you get lucky?
I appreciate your willingness to make it right, but I'm not interested in taking another chance on a product from this batch. I'll pass on the free product and wait for the next batch.
